code:
stateDiagram-v2
    state "Client hits /create endpoint" as conn 
    state "Are parameters valid?" as valid
    state if_valid <<choice>>
    state "False" as false
    state "True" as true
    [Infra_WorkerNode] --> conn: Client connects.
    conn --> valid
    valid --> if_valid
    if_valid --> false: No
    if_valid --> true: Yes
    false --> [Infra_WorkerNode]: 400 Response is sent
    true --> [Infra_LoadBalancer]: 200 Response is sent
